system.name: Genetic Memory
system.effect:
Target: Your Fossil Pokémon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining
Effect: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns any Move from its Egg Move or Tutor Move List. Genetic Memory may target a Pokémon only twice: once with a Tutor Move and once with an Egg Move. Egg Moves tutored this way do not count against the limit of 3 for TM and Tutor Moves.
